description: This file defines a function buildOceanTheme that constructs and returns a customized Material 3 theme for a Flutter application. It specifies colors, typography, and styling for various UI components such as AppBar, Card, Checkbox, Slider, Chip, ElevatedButton, FilledButton, and InputDecoration.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Represents the color scheme used across the theme, including primary, secondary, error colors, and correspondents for on-primary, on-secondary, etc.

classes.name: TextTheme
classes.description: Defines the typography styles used in the theme, here derived from Typography.material2021().black.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: Encapsulates the overall theme configuration for Material 3, including colorScheme, textTheme, component themes, and other stylistic options.

classes.name: AppBarTheme
classes.description: Customizes the appearance of the AppBar component.

classes.name: CardTheme
classes.description: Defines the visual style for Card widgets.

classes.name: CheckboxThemeData
classes.description: Specifies the styling for Checkbox widgets.

classes.name: SliderThemeData
classes.description: Defines the visual appearance of Slider widgets.

classes.name: ChipThemeData
classes.description: Provides styling options for Chip widgets.

classes.name: ElevatedButtonThemeData
classes.description: Defines the style for ElevatedButton widgets.

classes.name: FilledButtonThemeData
classes.description: Defines the style for FilledButton widgets.

classes.name: InputDecorationTheme
classes.description: Customizes the appearance of input fields, such as TextField.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with an Ocean-themed design, including specific colors, typography, and component styles.
